sourcesContent:
"use client" import type React from "react" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../../contexts/AuthContext" import { skillsAPI, pointsAPI } from "../../services/api" import type { Skill, Order } from "../../types" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import { AcademicCapIcon, TrophyIcon, StarIcon, PlusIcon, ClockIcon, UserIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth() const [mySkills, setMySkills] = useState([]) const [enrolledSkills, setEnrolledSkills] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData() }, []) const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const [skillsResponse, ordersResponse] = await Promise.all([ skillsAPI.getSkills({ instructor: user?.id }), pointsAPI.getOrders(), ]) setMySkills(skillsResponse.results) setEnrolledSkills(ordersResponse.results) } catch (error) { toast.error("Failed to fetch dashboard data") } finally { setLoading(false) } } const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case "completed": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" case "in_progress": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800" case "pending": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" case "cancelled": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } if (loading) { return (
) } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.first_name}!

Here's what's happening with your skills

{/* Stats Cards */}

Points Balance

{user?.points_balance}

Skills Taught

{user?.skills_taught}

Skills Learned

{user?.skills_learned}

Rating

{user?.rating.toFixed(1)}

{/* My Skills */}

My Skills

Create Skill
{mySkills.length > 0 ? (
{mySkills.slice(0, 3).map((skill) => (

{skill.title}

{skill.is_active ? "Active" : "Inactive"}

{skill.description}

{skill.rating.toFixed(1)} ({skill.reviews_count})
{skill.points_required} points
))} {mySkills.length > 3 && ( View all skills → )}
) : (

You haven't created any skills yet

Create Your First Skill
)}
{/* Enrolled Skills */}

Enrolled Skills

Browse Skills
{enrolledSkills.length > 0 ? (
{enrolledSkills.slice(0, 3).map((order) => (

{order.skill.title}

{order.status.replace("_", " ")}
{order.skill.instructor.first_name} {order.skill.instructor.last_name}
{order.skill.duration_hours}h
{order.points_spent} points spent
))} {enrolledSkills.length > 3 && ( View all orders → )}
) : (

You haven't enrolled in any skills yet

Browse Skills
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Create New Skill Browse Skills Buy Points Open Chat
) } export default Dashboard
